item.title: Jason add a quote by William Gibson
item.description: "The sky above the port was the color of television, tuned to a dead channel." -- William Gibson

item.title: Jason add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Hello babies. Welcome to Earth. It's hot in the summer and cold in the winter. It's round and wet and crowded. On the outside, babies, you've got a hundred years here. There's only one rule that I know of, babies-"God damn it, you've got to be kind." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Jason add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Everything was beautiful and nothing hurt." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Jason add a quote by Philip K. Dick
item.description: "No single thing abides; and all things are fucked up." -- Philip K. Dick

item.title: Jason add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Give a man a fire and he's warm for a day, but set fire to him and he's warm for the rest of his life." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Jason add a quote by J.G. Ballard
item.description: "Civilised life, you know, is based on a huge number of illusions in which we all collaborate willingly. The trouble is we forget after a while that they are illusions and we are deeply shocked when reality is torn down around us." -- J.G. Ballard
